name: Round Robbin'
description:
On blackest night, a small group of cloaked figures scale the castle walls – a monkey with a pickaxe, a bear with a crossbow, a fox in a suit of armour. Their goal: to relieve this castle of all its treasures. Through winding corridors, past guards and traps, they make their way to the vault. But as they grab their prize, a shout goes up, and the chase is on. At least there are no dead ends with enough gunpowder. At last the group explodes into the night, treasure in hand, safe – at least until their next heist.

Round Robbin’ is a medieval heist-em-up focused on dastardly plans, stealthy manoeuvres, and watching it all go horribly wrong.

Controls:

  • Keyboard - Join with any button
    • Movement: WASD
    • Aim: Mouse
    • Attack: Space
  • Controller - Join with any button
    • Movement: Left Stick
    • Aim: Right Stick
    • Attack: Right Trigger
